title: How do I send a multimedia message?
answer:
1. On the home screen, touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=109335). 

 1. In Messaging, touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=109336). 

 1. Enter the recipient and write the message. 

 1. Touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=109337) on the left of the text field, then Subject. The message is then converted into a multimedia message. 

 1. Touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=109338) and attach images, audio clips, or videos to the message. 

 1. [Touch Send.]()
